events.message: I just received my order, but the smartphone screen is cracked and has a scratch on the side.
The reported issue involves a damaged smartphone screen and visible scratch, categorizing this as a product defect.
Assigning this case to the product support specialist to address the cracked screen problem.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the damaged phone screen. I’m here to help resolve this issue for you.
Could you please provide photos of the cracked screen and the scratch, along with your order number?
Here are the photos showing the cracked screen and the scratch as requested. My order number is 123456789.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a full replacement phone shipped at no extra cost or a refund if you prefer.
I appreciate the quick response. I would prefer to receive a replacement phone as soon as possible.
Your replacement phone has been arranged and will ship today with expedited delivery. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement phone and that it arrived in perfect condition.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and everything is perfect. Thanks for the excellent support!
Closing this case now. Please reach out anytime if you need further assistance. Have a great day!
